name: BerryLand Arcade (Mobile and Tablet Version)
description:
Ever wanted to keep Playing BerryLand Arcade, But can't bring your pc to the ride?

Now you can play it on mobile! 

Get ready for BerryLand Arcade! 

This time, there are no movements buttons. just the buttons for running and throwing cupcakes!

Play Now and you're gaming days will be BERRIFIED!!

Get it? Berrified? Ah well you get the idea

A - Jump

B - Throw Cupcakes

Left and Right-  Movement (Bonus Level Only)

Avoid Carrots and Bottomless pits
